description: Air force pilots, other officers and civilians are jailed for trying to oust President Erdogan.
title: Turkey court jails hundreds for life for 2016 coup plot against Erdogan
title_page: Turkey court jails hundreds for life for 2016 coup plot against Erdogan - BBC News
maintext: The Hizmet movement led by Mr Gulen has been branded a "terrorist" organisation by Mr Erdogan. He was once an ally of the president, but since the coup attempt the 79-year-old cleric has remained a fugitive in Pennsylvania and Turkey wants his extradition.
